content.question: Which of the following devices is correctly paired to the air pollutant it would be used to measure?

choices.label: Measuring Device Pollutant Measured Gas sensor <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>
Measuring Device Pollutant Measured Electrostatic precipitator <math alttext="C O" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
Measuring Device Pollutant Measured Sound pressure level sensor Particulate Matter
Measuring Device Pollutant Measured Catalytic converter <math alttext="V O Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>VOCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: Measuring Device Pollutant Measured Gas sensor <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Describe an aspect of a research method, design, and/or measure used.
